channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
I have 2 questions to ask, so lets begin,
1. I have been working on a PI for the past while now, but I feel that when I put this up my players will not enjoy it, because it is older, (i like older but it seems rsfags do not), so I need something loading like a 508+ cache, and something that is a stable base, not bugged to death like insidna-X, any suggestions? (I am probably gonna be asked to do a Hyperion and other such things, I have messed around with them, but I want a PI, don't tell me other wise)
2. I have been trying to work on getting my cooking to run, but this line here, [code] if (c.playerCooking >= f.getReq()) { [/code] Does not let me cook sharks, which have a req of 80, but it lets me cook shrimp, with a req of 1, if I switch the symbol, it does the same, but vise versa, oh one more thing, anyone got a good cooking formula? Mine is horrible..

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97

if (c.playerCooking >= f.getReq()) {

Does not let me cook sharks, which have a req of 80, but it lets me cook shrimp, with a req of 1, if I switch the symbol, it does the same, but vise versa, oh one more thing, anyone got a good cooking formula? Mine is horrible…
